Class FilterMenu

java.lang.Object
view.FilterMenu
public class FilterMenu extends Object
Reusable component for filter menu UI. Promotes code reuse across different views.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private static final Scanner
    sc
    Scanner for user input
    private static final ThreadLocal<Boolean>
    skipEnterPrompt
    Thread-local flag to skip Enter prompts during batch operations

  • Field Details

    • sc

      private static final Scanner sc
      Scanner for user input

    • skipEnterPrompt

      private static final ThreadLocal<Boolean> skipEnterPrompt
      Thread-local flag to skip Enter prompts during batch operations

  • Constructor Details

    • FilterMenu

      private FilterMenu()
      Private constructor to prevent instantiation. This is a utility class with only static methods.

  • Method Details

    • showFilterMenu

      public static void showFilterMenu(FilterSettings filterSettings, Supplier getAllInternships, Function<Integer,String> detailGetter)
      Show filter menu and allow user to set filter options
      Parameters:
      filterSettings - Filter settings to modify
      getAllInternships - Supplier function to get all internships (for MVC compliance - goes through controller)
      detailGetter - Function to get internship details (for preview) Uses raw Supplier to avoid importing model classes in view layer while maintaining type compatibility

    • setSkipEnterPrompt

      private static void setSkipEnterPrompt(boolean skip)
      Sets whether to skip Enter prompts.
      Parameters:
      skip - true to skip prompts, false otherwise

    • shouldSkipEnterPrompt

      private static boolean shouldSkipEnterPrompt()
      Checks if Enter prompts should be skipped.
      Returns:
      true if prompts should be skipped, false otherwise

    • createFilterMenuOptions

      private static Map<Integer, MenuOption> createFilterMenuOptions(FilterSettings filterSettings, Supplier getAllInternships)
      Creates filter menu options using MenuOption pattern. Builds a map of menu choices to their corresponding filter actions.
      Parameters:
      filterSettings - The filter settings to modify
      getAllInternships - Supplier function to get all internships
      Returns:
      Map of menu option numbers to MenuOption objects

    • showFilterMenuDialog

      private static int[] showFilterMenuDialog(Map<Integer, MenuOption> options)
      Displays filter menu and gets user's comma-separated choices. Supports multiple selections for batch filter operations.
      Parameters:
      options - Map of menu options to display
      Returns:
      Array of selected menu option numbers

    • showError

      private static void showError(String message)
      Displays an error message. Skips Enter prompt during batch operations.
      Parameters:
      message - The error message to display

    • showRangeError

      private static void showRangeError(int maxValue)
      Displays a range validation error.
      Parameters:
      maxValue - The maximum valid value

    • parseDate

      private static LocalDate parseDate(String input)
      Parses a date string in YYYY-MM-DD format.
      Parameters:
      input - The date string to parse
      Returns:
      Parsed LocalDate or null if invalid format

    • displayMenuAndGetChoice

      private static int displayMenuAndGetChoice(String title, String[] options, String prompt, int maxValue)
      Displays a menu with numbered options and gets user choice.
      Parameters:
      title - The menu title
      options - Array of menu option labels
      prompt - The selection prompt
      maxValue - Maximum valid option number (unused but kept for consistency)
      Returns:
      The selected option number or -1 if invalid

    • displayListMenuAndGetChoice

      private static int displayListMenuAndGetChoice(String title, String clearOption, List<String> items, String prompt)
      Displays a menu from a dynamic list and gets user choice.
      Parameters:
      title - The menu title
      clearOption - The label for clear/reset option
      items - List of menu items
      prompt - The selection prompt
      Returns:
      The selected option number or -1 if invalid

    • showSuccess

      private static void showSuccess(String message)
      Displays a success message. Skips display during batch operations.
      Parameters:
      message - The success message to display

    • filterByDate

      private static void filterByDate(FilterSettings settings, String name, Consumer<LocalDate> setter)
      Handles date filter input and updates filter settings.
      Parameters:
      settings - The filter settings to modify
      name - The filter name (e.g., "Opening Date")
      setter - The setter function to apply the date filter

    • filterStatus

      private static void filterStatus(FilterSettings settings, String[] options)
      Handles status filter selection. Supports both enum-based and string-based status filters (AVAILABLE/FILLED).
      Parameters:
      settings - The filter settings to modify
      options - Array of status options to display

    • filterEnum

      private static void filterEnum(FilterSettings settings, String name, String[] options, Consumer<InternshipStatus> statusSetter, Integer offset, InternshipStatus[] statusValues)
      Handles enum-based filter selection (generic for level/status).
      Parameters:
      settings - The filter settings to modify
      name - The filter name
      options - Array of option labels
      statusSetter - Setter for InternshipStatus (can be null for non-status filters)
      offset - Index offset for mapping (can be null)
      statusValues - Array of enum values (can be null for non-enum filters)

    • filterFromList

      private static void filterFromList(FilterSettings settings, String name, String clearOption, List<String> items, Consumer<String> setter, Runnable clearAction)
      Handles filter selection from a dynamic list (e.g., majors, companies).
      Parameters:
      settings - The filter settings to modify
      name - The filter name
      clearOption - Label for clear option
      items - List of items to select from
      setter - The setter function to apply the filter
      clearAction - Action to run when clearing (can be null)

    • filterByOpeningDate

      private static void filterByOpeningDate(FilterSettings settings)
      Handles opening date filter input.
      Parameters:
      settings - The filter settings to modify

    • filterByClosingDate

      private static void filterByClosingDate(FilterSettings settings)
      Handles closing date filter input.
      Parameters:
      settings - The filter settings to modify

    • filterByKeyword

      private static void filterByKeyword(FilterSettings settings)
      Handles keyword filter input. Searches in title, description, and company name.
      Parameters:
      settings - The filter settings to modify

    • setSortOrder

      private static void setSortOrder(FilterSettings settings)
      Handles sort order selection.
      Parameters:
      settings - The filter settings to modify

    • showFilterPreview

      private static void showFilterPreview(FilterSettings filterSettings, Supplier getAllInternships, Function<Integer,String> detailGetter)
      Displays a preview of filtered results (first few items). Shows quick overview without pagination.
      Parameters:
      filterSettings - Current filter settings
      getAllInternships - Supplier function to get all internships
      detailGetter - Function to get internship details (unused in preview)

    • showFullPreview

      private static void showFullPreview(FilterSettings filterSettings, Supplier getAllInternships, Function<Integer,String> detailGetter)
      Displays a full paginated preview of filtered results. Allows detailed browsing of filter results.
      Parameters:
      filterSettings - Current filter settings
      getAllInternships - Supplier function to get all internships
      detailGetter - Function to get internship details

    • viewFilterDetails

      private static void viewFilterDetails(FilterSettings settings)
      Displays detailed view of current filter settings using FilterFormatter. Shows all filter states with formatted output.
      Parameters:
      settings - The filter settings to display

    • showCurrentFilters

      private static void showCurrentFilters(FilterSettings settings)
      Displays active filters only using FilterFormatter. Used before reset to show what will be cleared.
      Parameters:
      settings - The filter settings to display

    • waitForEnter

      private static void waitForEnter()
      Waits for user to press Enter before continuing. Delegates to ViewFormatter utility.
